xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 23 Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 23.7 Pañhāvāra » 23.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 23.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Anantara
Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Anantara
34.
3012Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—  purimā purimā anidassanaappaṭighā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ anidassanaappaṭighānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṃ gotrabhussa…  anulomaṃ vodānassa…  gotrabhu maggassa…  vodānaṃ maggassa…  maggo phalassa…  phalaṃ phalassa…  anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā…  nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
<< Adhipatiup Samanantara >>
